tool_description: Handles missing values in market data using various interpolation and imputation methods suitable for financial time series data.

input_data.description: Path or identifier to the dataset with missing values

method.description: Imputation method (forward_fill, backward_fill, linear_interpolation, spline, mean_imputation)

max_gap_size.description: Maximum consecutive missing values to interpolate

columns_to_process.description: Columns to apply missing data handling

error_messages: Invalid input data: The specified dataset cannot be accessed or is empty
Unsupported method: Use supported imputation methods (forward_fill, backward_fill, linear_interpolation, spline, mean_imputation)
Invalid gap size: max_gap_size must be between 1 and 100
Column not found: One or more specified columns do not exist in the dataset
usage: Provide input data path and optionally specify imputation method, maximum gap size, and columns to process. Returns cleaned dataset with imputed values.

rows_processed.description: Number of rows in the processed dataset

values_imputed.description: Total number of missing values that were imputed

imputation_summary.description: Summary of imputation applied to each column

remaining_gaps.description: Number of gaps that could not be filled
